Text.Page:
, I hear you aren't afraid of getting your hands dirty. I've got a job that involves dirty hands.

Or fingers, actually. And the rings on them.

I recognized a face among the undeadâ€”an old army buddy. I'm not sentimental, but his dad was a jeweler, and it got me thinking. I wonder how many of the undead are carrying valuables?

Hey, this is quite a pile! Let me see...

Hey, this is the one I saw!

I have a mate back home...well, a potential mate, anyway. This is just the sort of thing I can seal the deal with, if you know what I mean.

No way! Of course I won't tell her where I got it. My little secret.
Check the basement. Lots of scary corpses down there.
